variables.name: frequency
variables.comment: * channel frequency in MHz; for example channel 1 is specified as 2412

variables.name: passive
variables.comment:
* if true, scan this channel in passive fashion.
         * This flag is ignored on DFS channel specification.
         * @hide

variables.name: dwellTimeMS
variables.comment:
* how long to dwell on this channel
         * @hide
